dcterms:creator: C. Valentini-Botinhao
X. Wang
S. Takaki
J. Yamagishi
dcterms:description: The dataset is generated by simulation from two open data sources: Voice Bank corpus as speech data and DEMAND as environmental noise data. It includes a training set composed of 28 speakers and a test set composed of 2 speakers, with various noise conditions and signal-to-noise ratios.
dcterms:title: Dataset released by Valentini et al.

dcterms:creator: C. Veaux
J. Yamagishi
S. King
dcterms:description: A large regional accent speech database designed for speech synthesis research, containing recordings from multiple speakers.
dcterms:title: Voice Bank corpus

dcterms:creator: J. Thiemann
N. Ito
E. Vincent
dcterms:description: A database of multichannel environmental noise recordings designed to provide diverse acoustic noise environments for research.
dcterms:title: DEMAND
